page.title: 15Ashton Hayes C.P. School 2
page.content: All children have regular inspections for Health,Hygiene and Dental Care.There are lots of parents who help in school.They help with the library and the school gardens.The gardens are a feature of Ashton School.The school represents a cornerstone of village life.Under the direction of the headmaster,Mr Morris,the school promotes strong links with the community.It has a flourishing Parent Teacher Association. School governors,parents and friends are invited to share in school activities.
